title: Thunderbird for Android no longer synching automatically
creator: trhdawson
content: Until recently my Thunderbird for Android was synching every 15 minutes (as set in Settings). The number of new e-mails would appear on the TB icon on my screen. But recently this hasn't happened. I can still download e-mails, but I have to open the TB app first, whereupon (after a short delay) any new e-mails download without any further action from me. I didn't knowingly change anything. How can I get back to the original status, please?
